name: tfim
author: RW Cox
description: MCW TFIM: t-tests on sets of functional images

inputs.description: Prefix for output filenames. Default is 'tfim'.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Significance level (per voxel) to threshold the output with. Voxels with t-statistic less significant than this will have their diff output zeroed. Default is no threshold.
inputs.name: p-threshold

inputs.description: Write out the equivalent correlation statistic. The number 'dval' is the value to use for 'dof'. Default is not to write this file.
inputs.name: Equivalent correlation statistic

inputs.description: Compare -set1 and -set2 using a paired sample t-test. Illegal with the -base1 option.
inputs.name: Paired sample t-test

inputs.description: Base value for the first set of images. Used for Usage 2.
inputs.name: Base value

output-files.description: Difference image output. Default prefix is 'tfim'.
output-files.name: Difference Image Output

output-files.description: T-statistic of difference. Default prefix is 'tfim'.
output-files.name: T-Statistic Output

output-files.description: Equivalent correlation statistic output. Written if -eqcorr is used.
output-files.name: Correlation Statistic Output
